alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 30 at 8:29PM CDT until October 31 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Minor flooding of farm and ranch land is expected near the river. A few rural roads will be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 32.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.8 feet Saturday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
